mapper.sql: id, gmt_created, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, version, client_user_id, customer_id, customer_account_id, enable
mapper.insert: insert into moneyfeed.uc_customer_account_user_mapping (gmt_created, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, version, client_user_id, customer_id, customer_account_id, enable ) values (#{model.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{model.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{model.creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, 0, #{model.clientUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.customerAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.enable,jdbcType=BIT} )
